collection.body:
At the heart of what we do

Shopify kindly ask me to design a shirt around the concept of 'Design is at the heart of what we do'. They gifted it to the attendees of An Event Apart. I illustrated a human heart using hand drawn type. I also decided to record the process. You can watch it in the film below. If you'd like to get one of these shirts, there are a limited number available here.

Available Here
